name: Veggie Stir-Fry
steps: Wash and chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Mince the garlic.
Heat olive oil in a large pan or wok over medium-high heat.
Add minced garlic and sauté for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add broccoli, bell pepper, and carrot to the pan.
Stir-fry the vegetables for 5–7 minutes until just tender.
Pour in soy sauce and toss to coat the vegetables evenly.
Cook for another 1–2 minutes, then remove from heat and serve.

name: Quinoa Salad
steps: Rinse quinoa under cold water.
Cook quinoa according to package instructions, then let it cool.
Dice cucumber and halve cherry tomatoes.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, cucumber, and tomatoes.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Chill the salad in the refrigerator for at least 10 minutes before serving.

name: Pancakes
steps: In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, and baking powder.
In another bowl, whisk together egg, milk, and melted butter.
Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, stirring until just combined.
Let the batter rest for 5 minutes.
Heat a greased skillet over medium heat.
Pour 1/4 cup of batter onto the skillet for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown on both sides.
Serve warm with your favorite toppings.

name: Tomato Basil Pasta
steps: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente. Drain and save ½ cup pasta water.
Heat olive oil in a pan, sauté garlic for 20–30 seconds.
Add diced tomatoes and chili flakes, cook 5–7 minutes until slightly thickened.
Season with salt, pepper, and a pinch of sugar if needed.
Add drained pasta to the sauce, toss well. Add reserved pasta water to loosen sauce if needed.
Mix in chopped fresh basil.
Sprinkle Parmesan cheese if desired and serve immediately.

name: Chickpea Curry
steps: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onion until soft.
Add garlic and ginger, sauté for 1 minute.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft.
Stir in cumin, coriander, turmeric, chili powder, and salt.
Add chickpeas and ½ cup water, simmer 10 minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve hot.

name: Grilled Chicken Salad
steps: Season chicken with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Grill chicken on medium heat 5-6 minutes per side until fully cooked.
Let chicken rest, then slice thinly.
Arrange salad greens, cucumber, tomato, and onion on a plate.
Top with grilled chicken slices.
Drizzle lemon juice or balsamic vinegar and serve.

name: Omelette
steps: Beat eggs with milk, salt, and pepper.
Heat butter or oil in a pan on medium heat.
Pour egg mixture into the pan and cook until edges start to set.
Add desired fillings on one side.
Fold omelette in half and cook 1-2 more minutes until cooked through.
Serve hot.

name: Lentil Soup
steps: Heat oil in a pot and sauté onion and garlic until soft.
Add carrots and cumin powder, cook 2-3 minutes.
Add lentils and broth, bring to boil.
Reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes until lentils and carrots are soft.
Blend soup lightly for a smooth texture (optional).
Season with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve hot.

name: Veggie Tacos
steps: Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté onion and bell pepper until soft.
Add black beans, corn, cumin powder, salt, and pepper. Cook 3-4 minutes.
Warm tortillas in a pan or oven.
Fill tortillas with veggie mixture, top with salsa and cilantro, and serve.

name: Baked Salmon
steps: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F).
Place salmon on a baking tray, brush with olive oil, season with salt, pepper, and herbs.
Bake 12-15 minutes until salmon is cooked through.
Drizzle lemon juice and serve hot.

name: Tofu Stir-Fry
steps: Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic and ginger 30 seconds.
Add tofu cubes and cook until lightly golden.
Add vegetables and stir-fry 5-6 minutes until tender-crisp.
Add soy sauce, toss to coat, and serve immediately.

name: Beef Fried Rice
steps: Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add beef slices and cook until browned.
Push beef aside, scramble egg in the same pan.
Add rice and vegetables, stir well.
Pour soy sauce, mix thoroughly, and serve hot.

name: Greek Salad
steps: Melt butter in a pan, sauté onion until translucent.
Add mushrooms, cook 3-4 minutes.
Add rice, stir to coat with butter.
Gradually add warm broth, stirring frequently until rice is creamy and cooked.
Stir in Parmesan, season with salt and pepper, and serve.

name: Mushroom Risotto
steps: Melt butter in a pan, sauté onion until translucent.
Add mushrooms, cook 3-4 minutes.
Add rice, stir to coat with butter.
Gradually add warm broth, stirring frequently until rice is creamy and cooked.
Stir in Parmesan, season with salt and pepper, and serve.

name: Shakshuka
steps: Heat oil, sauté onion and bell pepper until soft.
Add garlic, cook 30 seconds.
Add tomatoes, paprika, salt, and pepper. Simmer 5-7 minutes.
Make small wells and crack eggs into the sauce.
Cover and cook until eggs are done to your liking.
Garnish with parsley and serve.

name: Veg Pulao
steps: Heat oil/ghee, add cumin seeds and sauté 30 seconds.
Add vegetables and sauté 2-3 minutes.
Add rice, water, and salt. Bring to boil.
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until rice is cooked.
Fluff with fork and serve.

name: Chana Masala
steps: Heat oil, sauté onion until soft.
Add garlic and ginger, cook 1 minute.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add spices, stir well.
Add chickpeas and water, simmer 10 minutes.
Garnish with cilantro and serve.

name: Palak Paneer
steps: Heat oil, add cumin seeds, then sauté onion until soft.
Add garlic, ginger, and tomato. Cook 2-3 minutes.
Add spices and spinach, cook 5 minutes.
Blend mixture if desired for smooth texture.
Add paneer cubes, simmer 5 minutes, and serve.

name: Aloo Paratha
steps: Mix flour and water to make soft dough. Rest 15 min.
Mix mashed potatoes with salt and cumin powder.
Roll dough into small circles, place potato filling, fold and roll again.
Cook on a hot griddle with ghee/oil until golden brown on both sides.
Serve hot with yogurt or pickle.

name: Masala Oats
steps: Heat oil, sauté onion until soft.
Add vegetables and spices, cook 2-3 minutes.
Add oats and water/milk, cook 3-5 minutes until oats are soft.
Serve hot.

name: Fruit Yogurt Parfait
steps: In a glass, layer yogurt, granola, and fruits.
Repeat layers until glass is filled.
Drizzle honey on top if desired and serve chilled.
